testcase.name: Test Case 21
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully.............passed Then User clicks on View Product button to review...........................passed Then Verify Write Your Review is visible on Product review..................passed Then User enters name, email and review on review Input Box.................passed Then User clicks 'Submit' button...........................................passed Then Verify success message 'Thank you for your review.' is seen............passed
